sen.j: 美保海軍航空隊（みほかいぐんこうくうたい）は、大日本帝国海軍の部隊・教育機関の一つ。
sen.e: Miho Naval Air Corps was one of the troops and educational institutions of the Imerpial Japanese Navy.
Miho Naval Air Corps was one of the troops and educational institutions of the Imerpial Japanese Navy.
Miho Naval Air Corps was one of the troops and educational institutions of the Imerpial Japanese Navy.

sen.j: 30000人もの大量の志願者を募った予科練甲飛第13期の生徒を教育するため増設された予科練教育航空隊である。
sen.e: It was an educational air corps of the preparatory pilot training course that was added in order to educate the students of the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course, which recruited as many as 30000 students.

It was an educational Air Corps of the preparatory pilot training course that was expanded in order to educate the students of the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course, which recruited as many as 30000 students.
sen.cmt: air corps→Air Corpsに変更しました。軍の施設「増設」にはaddよりもexpandの方が自然なので、added→expandedに変更しました。
sen.e: It was an educational Air Corps of the preparatory pilot training course that was expanded in order to educate the students of the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course, which recruited as many as 30000 students.

sen.j: 美保飛行場は昭和14年秋から造成が始まったが、昭和17年頃までは工事が進捗しなかった。
sen.e: The construction of Miho Airport started in fall, 1939, but the construction did not make much progres suntil around 1942.
The construction of Miho Airport started in the fall of 1939, but the construction did not make much progress until around 1942.
sen.cmt: in fall, 1939→in the fall of 1939に変更しました。progres suntil→スペルミスのためprogress untilに変更しました。
sen.e: The construction of Miho Airport started in the fall of 1939, but the construction did not make much progress until around 1942.

sen.j: 予科練航空隊増設を機に、呉海兵団を投入して突貫工事を進めたが、開隊までには完工にいたらず、入隊したばかりの甲飛13期生も残工事に借り出された。
sen.e: Along with the installation of an educational air corps of the preparatory pilot training course, the Kure Marine Team was introduced for a rush construction job, but it was not finished before the opening, and even the students the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course were required to do the remaining construction job.

Along with the installation of the educational Air Corps of the preparatory pilot training course, the Kure Marine Team was introduced for a rush construction job, but it was not finished before the opening, and even the students of the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course were required to do the remaining construction job.
sen.cmt: an educational→the educationalに変更しました。air corps→Air Corpsに変更しました。the Kureの前のスペースを削除しました。requiredの前のスペースを削除しました。students the 13th group→students of the 13th groupに変更しました。
sen.e: Along with the installation of the educational Air Corps of the preparatory pilot training course, the Kure Marine Team was introduced for a rush construction job, but it was not finished before the opening, and even the students of the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course were required to do the remaining construction job.

sen.j: 当初は練習機を備えて機上練習も可能だったが、昭和19年1月に初歩練習隊として第二美保海軍航空隊（だい2みほかいぐんこうくうたい）として独立した。
sen.e: In the beginning, it had trainer airplanes for onboard training, but in January, 1944, it became an independent elementary training corps called "the second Miho Naval Air Corps."
In the beginning, it had trainer airplanes for onboard training, but in January 1944, it became an independent elementary training corps called "the second Miho Naval Air Corps".
sen.cmt: in January, 1944→コンマ不要です。削除ピリオドが" "内に入っているので、外に移動。
sen.e: In the beginning, it had trainer airplanes for onboard training, but in January 1944, it became an independent elementary training corps called "the second Miho Naval Air Corps".

sen.j: 第二美保空は昭和20年2月11日をもって奈良県の柳本飛行場に移転し、「大和海軍航空隊（やまとかいぐんこうくうたい）」となる。
sen.e: The second Miho Naval Air Corps was moved to Yanagimoto Airport in Nara Prefecture on February 11, 1945, and became "Yamato Naval Air Corps."
The second Miho Naval Air Corps was transferred to Yanagimoto Airport in Nara Prefecture on February 11, 1945, and became "Yamato Naval Air Corps".
sen.cmt: この原文の場合「移転」の訳はtransferやrelocateの方が自然なためwas moved→was transferredに変更しました。ピリオドが" "内に入っているので、外に移動。
sen.e: The second Miho Naval Air Corps was transferred to Yanagimoto Airport in Nara Prefecture on February 11, 1945, and became "Yamato Naval Air Corps".

sen.j: 本稿では、第一・第二美保空に加え、転出後の大和空も併記する。
sen.e: In this document, in addition to the first and second Miho Naval Air Corps, Yamato Naval Air Corps after the transfer is described.
In this document, in addition to the first and second Miho Naval Air Corps, the Yamato Naval Air Corps after the transfer is described.
sen.cmt: Yamatoの前にtheを挿入しました。
sen.e: In this document, in addition to the first and second Miho Naval Air Corps, the Yamato Naval Air Corps after the transfer is described.

sen.j: 第一美保海軍航空隊
sen.e: The First Miho Naval Air Corps
The First Miho Naval Air Corps
The First Miho Naval Air Corps

sen.j: 甲飛第13期は空前の30000人規模の募集を図った。
sen.e: The 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course, which recruited as many as 30000 students.
The 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course recruited an unprecedented 30000 students.
sen.cmt: 訳文に主語に対する動詞が見当たらなかったので、,which を削除しました。「空前の」の訳出にas many asは少し弱い感じがするので、an unprecedented に変更しました。
sen.e: The 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course recruited an unprecedented 30000 students.

sen.j: これを収容するため、海軍は3個教育航空隊を増設する。
sen.e: In order to accommodate them, the Navy installed three new educational air corps.
In order to accommodate the students, the Navy installed three new educational Air Corps.
sen.cmt: them→the studentsに変更しました。air corps→Air Corpsに変更しました。
sen.e: In order to accommodate the students, the Navy installed three new educational Air Corps.

sen.j: 美保空・松山海軍航空隊・奈良海軍航空隊である。
sen.e: Namely, Miho Naval Air Corps, Matsuyama Naval Air Corps, and Nara Naval Air Corps.
They are the Miho Naval Air Corps, the Matsuyama Naval Air Corps, and the Nara Naval Air Corps.
sen.cmt: 文章として成立していないので、書き換えました。
sen.e: They are the Miho Naval Air Corps, the Matsuyama Naval Air Corps, and the Nara Naval Air Corps.

sen.j: 比較的整備された美保飛行場を活かすべく、若干の機上練習機を投入し、航空術訓練に充当した。
sen.e: In order to make use of Miho Airport, which was relatively well maintained, several trainer airplanes were supplied for the aviation training.
In order to make use of Miho Airport, which was relatively well maintained, several trainer airplanes were supplied for the aviation training.
In order to make use of Miho Airport, which was relatively well maintained, several trainer airplanes were supplied for the aviation training.

sen.j: 10月1日 開隊
sen.e: On October 1, it was opened.
October 1: Naval Air Corps was started.
sen.cmt: 年表形式に変更it was opened. →Naval Air Corps was started.に変更しました。
sen.e: October 1: Naval Air Corps was started.

sen.j: 美保を原隊とする第三八一海軍航空隊が開隊。
sen.e: The 381 Naval Air Corps, which has Miho as its unit, was opened.
The 381st Naval Air Corps, which the original unit was Miho, was opened.
sen.cmt: The 381→The 381stに変更全文見直しました。
sen.e: The 381st Naval Air Corps, which the original unit was Miho, was opened.

sen.j: 10月5日 甲飛第13期入隊（19年7月25日卒業）
sen.e: On October 5, the 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (graduated on July 25, 1944).
October 5: The 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (graduated on July 25, 1944).
October 5: The 13th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (graduated on July 25, 1944).

sen.j: 4月6日 甲飛第14期入隊（10月31日卒業延期）
sen.e: On April 6, the 14th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (the graduation postponed, October 31).
April 6: The 14th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (the graduation on October 31 was postponed).
sen.cmt: the graduation postponed, October 31→the graduation on October 31 was postponedに変更しました。
sen.e: April 6: The 14th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled (the graduation on October 31 was postponed).

sen.j: 9月8日 小松海軍航空隊開隊にともない、14期の一部転出。
sen.e: On September 8, with the opening of Komatsu Naval Air Corps, part of the 14th group was transferred.
September 8: With the opening of Komatsu Naval Air Corps, a part of the 14th group was transferred.
September 8: With the opening of Komatsu Naval Air Corps, a part of the 14th group was transferred.

sen.j: 9月20日 甲飛第15期前期入隊
sen.e: On September 20, the first half of the 15th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.
September 20: The 15th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled in the first half year.
sen.cmt: 訳文を全体的に見直しました。
sen.e: September 20: The 15th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled in the first half year.

sen.j: 10月20日 甲飛第15期生後期入隊
sen.e: On October 20, the second half of the 15th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.
October 20: The 15th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled in the last half year.
sen.cmt: 訳文を全体的に見直しました。
sen.e: October 20: The 15th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled in the last half year.

sen.j: 12月2日 15期前期の一部、小松空へ転出。
sen.e: On December 2, part of the first half of the 15th group was transferred to Komatsu Naval Air Corps.
December 2: A part of the 15th group of the first half year was transferred to the Komatsu Naval Air Corps.
sen.cmt: 訳文を全体的に見直しました。
sen.e: December 2: A part of the 15th group of the first half year was transferred to the Komatsu Naval Air Corps.

sen.cmt: コンマを削除しました。

sen.j: 3月1日 第十九連合航空隊解隊。
sen.e: On March 1, the 19th Combined Naval Air Corps broke up.
March 1: The 19th Combined Naval Air Corps was demobilized.
sen.cmt: broke up→was demobilizedに変更しました。
sen.e: March 1: The 19th Combined Naval Air Corps was demobilized.

sen.j: 二十三連合航空隊に転籍。
sen.e: was transferred to the 23th Combined Naval Air Corps.
It was transferred to the 23rd Combined Naval Air Corps.
sen.cmt: 主語抜けのため、Itを追加しました。23th→スペルミスのため23rdに修正しました。
sen.e: It was transferred to the 23rd Combined Naval Air Corps.

sen.j: 3月3日 14期・15期転出（美保飛行場拡張・新川基地建設など）
sen.e: On March 3, the 14th and 15th groups were transferred (expansion of Miho Airport and construction of Shinkawa Base, etc.)
March 3: The 14th and 15th groups were transferred (due to the expansion of Miho Airport or construction of Shinkawa Base and so on).
sen.cmt: コンマ抜けのため、コンマ追加しました。()内、due to theを追加しました。And→orに変更し、etc.→and so on.に変更。
sen.e: March 3: The 14th and 15th groups were transferred (due to the expansion of Miho Airport or construction of Shinkawa Base and so on).

sen.j: 4月5日 甲飛第16期入隊
sen.e: On April 5, the 16th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.
April 5: The 16th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.
April 5: The 16th group of the Ko-type preparatory pilot training course was enrolled.

sen.j: 5月29日 14期第一次特攻隊員、蛟龍訓練のため柳井潜水学校へ転出。
sen.e: On May 29, the first Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to Yanai Submarine School for the Koryu training.
May 29: The first Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to the Yanai Submarine School for the Koryu (a type of submarine) training.
sen.cmt: Yaniの前にtheを追加しました。Koryuの後に (a type of submarine)を追加しました。
sen.e: May 29: The first Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to the Yanai Submarine School for the Koryu (a type of submarine) training.

sen.j: 6月13日 14期第二次特攻要員、秋水訓練のため三重海軍航空隊へ転出。
sen.e: On June 13, the second Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to Mie Naval Air Corps for the Shusui training.
June 13: The second Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to the Mie Naval Air Corps for the Shusui (a Japanese World War II rocket-powered interceptor aircraft) training.
sen.cmt: Mieの前にtheを追加しました。Shusui の後に (a Japanese World War II rocket-powered interceptor aircraft)を追加しました。
sen.e: June 13: The second Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to the Mie Naval Air Corps for the Shusui (a Japanese World War II rocket-powered interceptor aircraft) training.

sen.j: 6月14日 16期退隊。
sen.e: On June 14, the 16th group left the Corps.
June 14: The 16th group left the Corps.
June 14: The 16th group left the Corps.

sen.j: 6月20日 14期第三次特攻要員、佐伯防備隊へ転出。
sen.e: On June 20, the third Kamikaze Corps in the 14th groups was transferred to Saeki Defense Corps.
June 20: The third Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to the Saeki Defense Corps.
sen.cmt: groups→groupに修正しました。Saekiの前にtheを追加しました。
sen.e: June 20: The third Kamikaze Corps in the 14th group was transferred to the Saeki Defense Corps.

sen.j: 6月23日 14期残留隊員、特攻予備員として倉敷海軍航空隊へ転出。
sen.e: On June 23, the remaining members in the 14th groups were transferred to Kurashiki Naval Air Corps as a pool of Kamikaze members.
June 23: The remaining members in the 14th group were transferred to the Kurashiki Naval Air Corps as a Kamikaze Reserve Corps.
sen.cmt: groups→groupに修正しました。Kurashikiの前にtheを追加しました。 a pool of Kamikaze members. →as a Kamikaze Reserve Corps. に変更しました。
sen.e: June 23: The remaining members in the 14th group were transferred to the Kurashiki Naval Air Corps as a Kamikaze Reserve Corps.

sen.j: 6月30日 美保海軍航空隊解隊
sen.e: On June 30, Miho Naval Air Corps broke up.
June 30: The Miho Naval Air Corps was demobilized.
sen.cmt: Mihoの前にtheを追加しました。broke up→was demobilizedに変更しました。年表形式はここで終わります。
sen.e: June 30: The Miho Naval Air Corps was demobilized.

sen.j: 予科練教育の凍結を期に、14期・15期は他の部隊に派遣され、解隊を前に美保空から生徒はすべて転出した。
sen.e: The greezing of the education of the preparatory pilot training course triggerred the dispatch of the 14th and 15th groups to other corps, and all the studends of Miho Naval Air Corps were transferred before its breaking up.

The freezing of the education of the preparatory pilot training course triggered the dispatch of the 14th and 15th groups to the other corps, and all the students of the Miho Naval Air Corps were transferred before it was demobilized.
sen.cmt: greezingスペルミスのため→freezingtreggerredはスペルミスです。→triggeredotherの前にtheを追加しました。studendsはスペルミスです。→studentsMihoの前にtheを追加しました。before its breaking up.→before it was demobilized.に変更しました。
sen.e: The freezing of the education of the preparatory pilot training course triggered the dispatch of the 14th and 15th groups to the other corps, and all the students of the Miho Naval Air Corps were transferred before it was demobilized.

sen.j: 空になった美保飛行場は、乙飛行隊の海軍乙航空隊山陰海軍航空隊の作戦基地として充てられたが、本土決戦を迎えることなく終戦となった。
sen.e: Miho Airport, now deserted, was appointed as an operating base of Otsu Naval Air Corps and Sanin Naval Air Corps of Otsu Air Corps, but the war was brought to an end before a homeland defense war started.
sen.cmt: 乙飛行隊の海軍乙航空隊山陰海軍航空隊の切れ目が不鮮明です。
sen.e: The vacant Miho Airport was used as an operating base of the Otsu Naval Air Corps and Sanin Naval Air Corps of the Otsu Air Corps, but the war ended before the homeland defense war started.
sen.cmt: Miho Airport, now deserted→The vacant Miho Airportに変更しました。appointed→usedに変更Otsuの前にtheを追加しました。was brought to an end→endedに変更しました。
sen.e: The vacant Miho Airport was used as an operating base of the Otsu Naval Air Corps and Sanin Naval Air Corps of the Otsu Air Corps, but the war ended before the homeland defense war started.

sen.e: Main Models
Main Models
Main Models

sen.j: 機上練習機各種。

Successive Commanders

sen.j: 高橋俊策（昭和18年10月1日 -）
sen.e: Shunsaku TAKAHASHI (From October 1, 1943 to -)
Shunsaku TAKAHASHI (From October 1, 1943 to -)
Shunsaku TAKAHASHI (From October 1, 1943 to -)

sen.j: 釜田勇（昭和19年6月21日 -）
sen.e: Isamu KAMATA (From June 21, 1944 to -)
Isamu KAMATA (From June 21, 1944 to -)
Isamu KAMATA (From June 21, 1944 to -)

sen.j: 山崎義（昭和20年2月14日－昭和20年6月30日解隊）
sen.e: Yoshi Yamazaki (From February 14 to June 30, 1945 (the Corps broke up))
sen.cmt: 山崎義の読み方不明です。
sen.e: Yoshi Yamazaki (From February 14 to June 30, 1945 [the Corps was demobilized.])
sen.cmt: ()→[]に修正。broke up→was demobilizedに変更しました。山崎義の読み方不明です。
sen.e: Yoshi Yamazaki (From February 14 to June 30, 1945 [the Corps was demobilized.])

sen.j: 第二美保海軍航空隊
sen.e: The Second Miho Naval Air Corps
The Second Miho Naval Air Corps
The Second Miho Naval Air Corps

sen.j: 甲飛第12期以前の予科練生の訓練に充てるべく、昭和19年より開かれた。
sen.e: It was opened in 1944 in order to train the students enrolled before the 12th group of the preparatory pilot training course.
It was opened in 1944 in order to train the students enrolled before the 12th group of the preparatory pilot training course.
It was opened in 1944 in order to train the students enrolled before the 12th group of the preparatory pilot training course.

sen.j: 美保空卒業生は甲飛13期に限定されるため、美保飛行場で訓練を完了できたのは彼らだけである。
sen.e: The graduates from Miho Naval Air Corps were limited to the 13th group of Ko-type so it was only they that were able to finish their training at Miho Airport.
The graduates from the Miho Naval Air Corps were limited to the 13th group of Ko-type, therefore only they were able to finish their training at the Miho Airport.
sen.cmt: Mihoの前にtheを追加しました。soは口語的なのでthereforeに変更しました。it was only they that were→ only they wereに変更しました。
sen.e: The graduates from the Miho Naval Air Corps were limited to the 13th group of Ko-type, therefore only they were able to finish their training at the Miho Airport.

sen.j: 1月15日 開隊。
sen.e: On January 15, it was opened.
January 15: Naval Air Corps was started.
sen.cmt: 年表形式に変更it was opened. →Naval Air Corps was started.に変更しました。
sen.e: January 15: Naval Air Corps was started.

sen.j: 第十二連合航空隊に編入。
sen.e: It was incorporated into the 12th Combined Air Corps.
It was placed to the 12th Combined Air Corps.
sen.cmt: incorporated into→placed toに変更しました。
sen.e: It was placed to the 12th Combined Air Corps.

sen.j: 3月15日 峰山海軍航空隊発足。
sen.e: On March 15, Mineyama Navy Air Corps was inaugurated.
March 15: The Mineyama Navy Air Corps was inaugurated.
sen.cmt: Mineyamaの前にtheを追加しました。
sen.e: March 15: The Mineyama Navy Air Corps was inaugurated.

sen.j: 4月1日 美保を原隊とする第一〇八一海軍航空隊が開隊。
sen.e: On April 1, the 1081 Naval Air Corps, which as Miho as its unit, was opened.
April 1: The 1081st Naval Air Corps, which the original unit was Miho, was opened.
sen.cmt: The 1081→The 1081stに変更全文見直しました。
sen.e: April 1: The 1081st Naval Air Corps, which the original unit was Miho, was opened.

sen.j: 7月25日 飛練第40期入隊。
sen.e: On July 25, the 40th group of aviation training students was enrolled.
July 25: The 40th group of aviation training students was enrolled.
July 25: The 40th group of aviation training students was enrolled.

sen.j: 2月1日 全機（練習機54機）柳本に出発。
sen.e: On February 1, all the airplanes (54 trainer airplanes) departed for Yanagimoto.
February 1: All the airplanes (54 trainer airplanes) departed for Yanagimoto.
February 1: All the airplanes (54 trainer airplanes) departed for Yanagimoto.

sen.j: 2月11日 解隊。
sen.e: On February 11, the corps broke up.
February 11: The Corps was demobilized.
sen.cmt: broke up→was demobilizedに変更しました。
sen.e: February 11: The Corps was demobilized.

sen.j: 全部隊は奈良県柳本飛行場に転出。
sen.e: All the troops were transferred to Yamagimoto Airport in Nara Prefecture.
All the troops were transferred to Yamagimoto Airport in Nara Prefecture.
All the troops were transferred to Yamagimoto Airport in Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 昭和20年に入ると、美保飛行場は実施部隊の駐留が相次ぎ、初歩練習・中間練習が困難となっていた。
sen.e: In 1945, troops were successively stationed at Miho Airport, and it was getting difficult to have elementary and intermediate training.
In 1945, the troops were successively stationed in Miho Airport, and it was getting difficult to have elementary and intermediate training.
sen.cmt: troopsの前にtheを追加しました。stationed at→前置詞はin
sen.e: In 1945, the troops were successively stationed in Miho Airport, and it was getting difficult to have elementary and intermediate training.

sen.j: 柳本飛行場の造成が進行したことから、練習隊は美保飛行場を明け渡して柳本に転出した。
sen.e: As the construction of Yanagimoto Airport was under way, the training group left Miho Airport and was transferred to Yanagimoto.
As the construction of Yanagimoto Airport was making progress, the training group left Miho Airport and was transferred to Yanagimoto.
sen.cmt: under way→making progressに変更しました。
sen.e: As the construction of Yanagimoto Airport was making progress, the training group left Miho Airport and was transferred to Yanagimoto.

sen.j: これを機に、峰山分遣隊は姫路海軍航空隊に委譲された。
sen.e: At the same time, Mineyama Contingent Force was delegated to Himeji Naval Air Corps.
At the same time, the Mineyama Contingent Force was delegated to the Himeji Naval Air Corps.
At the same time, the Mineyama Contingent Force was delegated to the Himeji Naval Air Corps.

sen.e: Shunsaku TAKAHASHI (From October 1, 1943, to -)
Shunsaku TAKAHASHI (From October 1, 1943, to -)

sen.j: 以降不明
sen.e: after him, Unknown
After him, Unknown

sen.j: 大和海軍航空隊
sen.e: Yamato Naval Air Corps
Yamato Naval Air Corps
Yamato Naval Air Corps

sen.j: 昭和18年頃より予備工事が始まり、19年から近隣の勤労奉仕や朝鮮人を動員して急速設営された柳本飛行場で開かれた。
sen.e: The preliminary construction was started around 1943, and the Corps was started at Yamagimoto Airport, which was rapidly constructed by volunteers and Koreans in the neighborhood in 1944.
The preliminary construction was started around 1943, and the Corps was started at Yamagimoto Airport, which was rapidly constructed by volunteers and Koreans in the neighborhood in 1944.
The preliminary construction was started around 1943, and the Corps was started at Yamagimoto Airport, which was rapidly constructed by volunteers and Koreans in the neighborhood in 1944.

sen.j: 開隊に先立って、要員は空路で柳本に到着している。
sen.e: Before the opening, the members had arrived at Yanagimoto by air.
Before the opening, the members had arrived at Yanagimoto by air.
Before the opening, the members had arrived at Yanagimoto by air.

sen.j: 本土決戦時に紀伊半島への上陸を警戒した海軍は、航空艦隊第三航空艦隊司令部を柳本に進出する計画を持っていたといわれる。
sen.e: It is said that the Navy planned to move the Headquarter of the third Air Corps of the Aviation Fleet to Yamagimoto, for it was on the alert for the landing on Kii Peninsula in the homeland defense war.

It is said that the Navy planned to move the Headquarter of the third Air Corps of the Aviation Fleet to Yanagimoto, since the Navy was on the alert for the landing on Ki Peninsula in the homeland defense war.
sen.cmt: Yamagimoto→間違いです。Yanagimotoに修正しました。for→sinceに変更しました。主語があいまいなため、itをthe Navy に変更しました。Kii→Ki 母音が重なっているので変更しました。
sen.e: It is said that the Navy planned to move the Headquarter of the third Air Corps of the Aviation Fleet to Yanagimoto, since the Navy was on the alert for the landing on Ki Peninsula in the homeland defense war.

sen.j: 2月11日 開隊。
sen.e: It was opened on February 11.
February 11: Naval Air Corps was started.
sen.cmt: 年表形式に変更it was opened. →Naval Air Corps was started.に変更しました。
sen.e: February 11: Naval Air Corps was started.

sen.j: 第十一連合航空隊に編入。
sen.e: It was corporated into the 11th Combined Air Corps.
It was placed to the 11th Combined Air Corps.
sen.cmt: corporated into→placed toに変更しました。
sen.e: It was placed to the 11th Combined Air Corps.

sen.j: 5月5日 十一連空解散、第十三航空戦隊に転籍。
sen.e: On May 5, the 11th Combined Air Corps was dismissed and was transferred to the 13th Air Corps.
May 5: The 11th Combined Air Corps was demobilized and was transferred to the 13th Air Corps.
May 5: The 11th Combined Air Corps was demobilized and was transferred to the 13th Air Corps.

sen.j: 終戦後解隊。
sen.e: It broke up after the war.
It was demobilized after the war.
sen.cmt: broke up→was demobilizedに変更しました。年表形式はここで終わります。
sen.e: It was demobilized after the war.

sen.j: 7月には柳本に戦闘機隊が進出し、乙飛行隊の海軍乙航空隊近畿海軍航空隊司令部が置かれるなど、柳本は増強の一途をたどっていた。
sen.e: In July, fighting troops moved to Yanagimoto, and Yanagimoto was increasingly reinforced with the Headquarter of Kinki Naval Air Corps of Naval Otsu Air Corps of Otsu Air Corps and so forth.
sen.cmt: 乙飛行隊の海軍乙航空隊近畿海軍航空隊の切れ目が不鮮明です。
sen.e: In July, the fighting troops moved to Yanagimoto, and Yanagimoto was increasingly reinforced with the Headquarter of the Kinki Naval Air Corps of Naval Otsu Air Corps of Otsu Air Corps.
sen.cmt: theを追加しました。 and so forth削除しました。
sen.e: In July, the fighting troops moved to Yanagimoto, and Yanagimoto was increasingly reinforced with the Headquarter of the Kinki Naval Air Corps of Naval Otsu Air Corps of Otsu Air Corps.

sen.j: 大和空の訓練も特攻主体となっており、稼動するわずかな機体は特攻用に温存される状況の中で終戦を迎えた。
sen.e: The training of Yamato Naval Air Corps also focused on suiticide attacks, the war was ended while only a few planes working were saved for suicide attacks.
The training of the Yamato Naval Air Corps also focused on suicide attacks, and the war was ended while only a few activate airplanes was preserved for the suicide attacks.
sen.cmt: suiticideスペルミスのため→suicideに変更。二つの文をつなげる接続詞がなかったので、andを挿入しました。the war以降、全文を見直しました。
sen.e: The training of the Yamato Naval Air Corps also focused on suicide attacks, and the war was ended while only a few activate airplanes was preserved for the suicide attacks.

sen.j: 三航艦に続き、大本営海軍部の進出計画もあったといわれる。
sen.e: As well as the third fleet, it is said that there was a plan to move the Navy of the Imperial Headquarters there.
As well as the third fleet, it is said that there was a plan of the advancement of the Navy of the Imperial Headquarters.
sen.cmt: to move→of the advancement ofに変更しました。thereを削除しました。
sen.e: As well as the third fleet, it is said that there was a plan of the advancement of the Navy of the Imperial Headquarters.

sen.j: 主要機種
sen.e: Main Models
Main Models
Main Models

sen.j: 九三式中間練習機
sen.e: The Yokosuka K5Y
The Yokosuka K5Y
The Yokosuka K5Y

sen.j: 機上練習機各種。
sen.e: Various trainer airplanes
Various trainer airplanes
Various trainer airplanes

sen.j: 歴代司令
sen.e: Successive Commanders
Successive Commanders
Successive Commanders

sen.j: 内田市太郎（昭和20年2月11日－終戦後解隊）
sen.e: Ichitaro UCHIDA (From February 11, 1945 － afte the war the Corps broke up)
Ichitaro UCHIDA (From February 11, 1945 until the Corps was demobilized after the war.)
sen.cmt: afte→スペルミスのためafter-→untilに変更after the war the Corps broke up意味不明のため→the Corps was demobilized after the warに変更しました。
sen.e: Ichitaro UCHIDA (From February 11, 1945 until the Corps was demobilized after the war.)

sen.j: 戦後の美保飛行場・柳本飛行場
sen.e: Miho Airport and Yanagimoto Airport after the war
Miho Airport and Yanagimoto Airport after the war
Miho Airport and Yanagimoto Airport after the war

sen.j: 美保飛行場は、米軍の駐留の後、昭和33年に返還された。
sen.e: Miho Airport was returned in 1958 after the stationing of the United States Forces.
The Miho Airport was returned in 1958 after the stationing of the United States Forces.
The Miho Airport was returned in 1958 after the stationing of the United States Forces.

sen.j: 昭和30年より航空自衛隊が駐留しており、現在、防衛省管轄の飛行場であるが、（米軍の駐留中から）民間航空にも開放され、「美保飛行場」（または「美保空港」）の通称で利用されている。
sen.e: From 1955 on, Japan Air Self-Defense Force was stationed, and currently it is an airport under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Defense, but it has been also open for private aviation (even during the stationing of the U.S. forces), and it is used under the name of "Miho Airport".

Since 1955, the Japan Air Self-Defense Force has been stationed in the airport, and although it is currently the airport under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Defense, it has been open for private aviation (even during the stationing of the U.S. forces), and used under the name of 'Miho Airport'.
sen.cmt: From 1955 on→Since 1955,に変更しました。文法ミスのため、was→has beenに変更しました。stationedの後にin the airportを追加しました。全文見直しました。原文の「」にならって" "→' 'に修正しました。
sen.e: Since 1955, the Japan Air Self-Defense Force has been stationed in the airport, and although it is currently the airport under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Defense, it has been open for private aviation (even during the stationing of the U.S. forces), and used under the name of 'Miho Airport'.

sen.j: 一方、柳本飛行場は米軍の接収が終了すると農地に戻された。
sen.e: On the other hand, Yanagimoto Airport was turned back into a field after the seizure of the U.S. Forces was finished.
On the other hand, the Yanagimoto Airport was turned back into the agricultural land after the seizure of the U.S. Forces was finished.
sen.cmt: theを追加しました。原文に忠実に訳出するためa field→the agricultural landに変更しました。
sen.e: On the other hand, the Yanagimoto Airport was turned back into the agricultural land after the seizure of the U.S. Forces was finished.

sen.j: 土地改良によって痕跡は薄れてはいるが、防空壕などの付帯設備の残骸が周辺各地にも残っている。
sen.e: There is hardly any trace of the airport due to the land improvement, but such remains of affiliated facilities as bomb shelters can be stii found in the nearby areas.
Although the traces of the airport have faded due to the land improvement, the remains of the affiliated facilities such as bomb shelters can be found in the surrounding area.
sen.cmt: 全文を見直しました。stii→stillだと思われますが、削除しました。
sen.e: Although the traces of the airport have faded due to the land improvement, the remains of the affiliated facilities such as bomb shelters can be found in the surrounding area.
